label: Kasama dito ang Netherlands, dahil si Anna Jochemsen ay nagtapos na ikasiyam sa klaseng pambabaeng nakatayo sa Super-G kahapon, at ang Finland dahil si Katja Saarinen ay nagtapos na ikasampu sa parehong laban.

prompts.text: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.

prompts.text: He arrived in the US with 4 cents to his name, a book of poetry, and a letter of recommendation from Charles Batchelor (his manager in his previous job) to Thomas Edison.
